name: Dark Realm: Queen of Flames Collector's Edition
description: Without warning, a group of mysterious figures arrives and reduces your village to flames and rubble. What do they want... and who is controlling them?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1333 MB available space
